Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A cordial glass of $(this.trait:liquid). The stem has been etched with a repetitive miniature windmill design.

The heat of wildenland whiskey combined with the sweetness of heather honey washes over your taste buds. After swallowing, the flavor of honey and a mixture of herbs yield to a black licorice aftertaste.
